mapper.select: SELECT prize_id AS prizeId, prize_name AS prizeName, total_count AS totalCount, current_count AS currentCount, min_join_count AS minJoinCount, probability AS probability, active_yn AS activeYn FROM prize WHERE prize_id = #{prizeId}

SELECT prize_id AS prizeId, prize_name AS prizeName, total_count AS totalCount, current_count AS currentCount, min_join_count AS minJoinCount, probability AS probability, active_yn AS activeYn FROM prize WHERE min_join_count <= #{minJoinCount} AND active_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prize ( prize_name, total_count, current_count, min_join_count, probability, active_yn ) VALUES ( #{prizeName}, #{totalCount}, #{currentCount}, #{minJoinCount}, #{probability}, #{activeYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE prize SET prize_name = #{prizeName}, total_count = #{totalCount}, current_count = #{currentCount}, min_join_count = #{minJoinCount}, probability = #{probability}, active_yn = #{activeYn} WHERE prize_id = #{prizeId}
